specifications.Finish: Decoration > Embroidery Embroidery is a decorative finishing that uses different stitches, yarns, and materials to create patterns on the fabric. This process adds visual interest, texture, and a handcrafted feel.
specifications.Dye Method: Yarn Dye Yarn dye is the process of coloring yarn before it is used to make fabric. It results in even color and enhanced color fastness in the finished fabric.
specifications.Care Instructions: Hand wash only Wash separately Turn inside out before washing, Do not wring Do not bleach Line dry Do not tumble dry Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Recommended Use Dresses
